snippet: One of the great mysteries of the 2012 playoffs is how the Kings suddenly transformed from a mediocre team that barely made the playoffs to the juggernaut they have been in the postseason.
abstract: One of the great mysteries of the 2012 playoffs is how the Kings suddenly transformed from a mediocre team that barely made the playoffs to the juggernaut they have been in the postseason.

headline.main: Luck and Shooting Accuracy in Los Angeles
